schedule: Fernando de Noronha - Natal - Rio de Janeiro
circumstances: The seaplane named 'Olinda' was performing a flight from Europe to South America with intermediate stops in Fernando de Noronha, Natal and Rio de Janeiro. While taking off from the Rio Potenji in Natal, the aircraft hit a floating object and crashed. Three occupants were killed while a crew member was injured.
probable_cause: Collision with an unknown floating object while taking off from the Rio Potenji.
